title: Moer Zhuangyuan Da Dianying 3: Mohuan Lieche Da Maoxian
original_name: 摩尔庄园大电影 3：魔幻列车大冒险
sinopse:
In the sky tree house of Moore Manor, Mole Lele and Uncle Bodhi lead a peaceful life. Due to a misunderstanding, Molele missed a good opportunity to travel abroad. Sad Lele, but unexpectedly received a magical train ticket. Then, he summoned a train that descended from the sky and agreed to the three requirements on the ticket, starting an infinitely exciting journey. Molele and her friends went to the earth on their expeditions, but were also intercepted by fierce air bandits. The children were amazed by what they saw and heard along the way: the question mark of the crop circle; the adventure of the desert town; the surprise of the wormhole leap...
(translated from baidu baike)
